mutants.code:
import re

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    string = re.sub('', ' ', string)
    words = string.split(' ')
    words = words[::-1]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(words)
    return reversed_string

import re

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    string = re.sub('\\s+', '', string)
    words = string.split(' ')
    words = words[::-1]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(words)
    return reversed_string

import re

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    string = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', string)
    words = string.split(' ')
    words = words[::--1]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(words)
    return reversed_string
